After concentrating chakra into their right hand, the user propels the opponent over a long distance. When the move is performed, Guy's hand seems to have an orange glow, which is possibly due to chakra concentration.

[[es:Bofetada Ardiente de Juventud]]
[[pl:Płonące Trzepnięcie Młodości]]
